name: Better Dynamo Administration
body:
Better Dynamo Administration === Better Dynamo Administration (BDA) is a user script that improves ATG Dynamo Administration experience. It takes 3 minutes to install and will help you to save plenty of time. Features ------ *Click on images for more details* * Basic xml tags editor in repositories pages, avoiding you to type your "print-item" request every time. :)
Without BDA With BDA
* Toolbar to easily navigate through components & your component navigation history
Without BDA With BDA
* Performance monitor table sortable by column and more handsome * Backup and restore capabilities of toolbar and editor data * Lot more inconming, check the milestone ! Installation --- ### Firefox * Install Grease Monkey extension : https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/ * Go to this url : https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jc7447/bda/master/bda.user.js * Accept installation * Enjoy :) If you're not happy with BDA behaviour, you can simply disable it by clicking on the monkey head of Greasemonkey. ### Google Chrome * Install Tampermonkey extension : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo * Go to this url : https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jc7447/bda/master/bda.user.js * Accept installation * Enjoy :) Disclaimer --- This project is completely unofficial and in no way endorsed by Oracle Corporation.
